chapter.text:
You try the door again.^1500 The handle breaks and the door swings open.^1500 You walk towards the principal's desk.^1500 It's covered in paperwork about students you donâ€™t know well enough to recognize.^1500 In the corner of your eye you catch the glimpse of her PC power light flashing.^1500
Outside, you hear rustling of glass.
